## Credly GitHub Readme Widgets

**获取为您的 GitHub 个人资料 Readme 动态生成的组件，这些组件包含您的 Credly 认证信息。**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/mechdeveloper/github-readme-widgets?tab=readme-ov-file)
[![ref-online-tool]](https://www.credly.com/)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://github.com/mechdeveloper/github-readme-widgets)
![ref-need-register]

### 参数

<details >
<summary><small>点击显示/关闭参数</small></summary><p></p>

| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 参数描述 | 更多描述 |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-querys] | | | | | |
| `username` | `string` | `true` |  | Credly 网站的用户名 | 示例：`ashishsinghbaghel` |
| `theme` | `string` |  | `default` | 主题色 | 可选值：`default`, `dark` or `tokyonight`。 |

</details>

```txt
https://github-readme-widgets.vercel.app/api{?username,theme}
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/回到顶部-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### 示例

```markdown
<!-- Certifications -->
![Credly Certifications 小部件](https://github-readme-widgets.vercel.app/api?username=ashishsinghbaghel&theme=dark)
```

<div>
  <img src="https://github-readme-widgets.vercel.app/api?username=ashishsinghbaghel&#38;theme=dark" alt="Credly Certifications 小部件" />
</div>
